channel.title: I'm Apostle and I can read ALL whispers
channel.description:
#### What happened? I spired 7, instead i read ALL whispers from everyone #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Just see 7's whispers #### Steps to reproduce: Convert a Noble and use spy presumably #### Comments:
Edit : next night was normal

item.title: I'm Apostle and I can read ALL whispers
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
Seems to be a thing the first night after a conversion as near as I can tell.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm Apostle and I can read ALL whispers
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
I was actually in your game. You died and I was cult that was still alive. I believe you were a converted Psychic and I was sad because I wanted a Royal Blooded Apostle.

item.title: I'm Apostle and I can read ALL whispers
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
Actually no, I got everyone elses.

I read the Psychic Private Mattering the Prince (14 & 16 iirc) and like 9 and 10 whispering

People were saying it happens when you get converted? Like the next day you read all whispers for that day.

Read full topic
item.source: I'm Apostle and I can read ALL whispers
